answerText: cortisol[10] This hormone stiumalates the production of cortisol. Elevated levels of this hormone are found in people with Addison's disease.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 15 | 3 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This hormone is produced in the zona fasciculata of the adrenal gland. For 10 points each: [10] Name this "stress hormone," too much of which can cause Cushing's syndrome.
